entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 14 April 2023
